display_long_description:
Strap into EXOcars and compete against real players in single-player races and real-time multiplayer. Exciting driving feedback, advanced physics and graphics make for an unparalleled VR buggy racing experience. 

[media]

**SPEED AND SPECTACLE**

From streets and stadiums to deserts, mountains and a tropical paradise - Track design in EXOcars pays close attention to landscape, surface type, and terrain relief.

Featuring ramps, drifts, and natural obstacles, it makes you feel like a driver of a roaring buggy car, speeding through stunning scenery!

[media]

**ADVANCED GRAPHICS AND PHYSICS**

EXOcars pushes hardware limits on both Meta Quest 2&3, offering high fidelity graphics and rock-solid framerate. 

The game is based on real car physics. Suspension dynamics and track surface interactions ensure an immersive driving experience.

[media]

**MAKE YOUR FRIENDS BITE THE DUST**

Each single-player race puts you against ghosts of real opponents matched to your skill level, allowing you to progress and become a top-notch pilot organically.

Real-time multiplayer lets you compete with friends. Or find new ones in social lobbies!

Whether you’re a casual driver or a seasoned champion, our matchmaking will suit your needs. 

[media]

**READY TO RELEASE THE BRAKE?** 

Carving through the wilderness or tearing up the asphalt, EXOcars promises an unparalleled experience that will keep you coming back for more. 

- Tournaments with real prizes
- Car customization
- New game modes
- Challenges and seasonal events 

**… and we’re just getting started!** 
[media]
